allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: project setup and PDF extraction proof-of-concept

- CLAUDE.md: Technical decisions and project documentation
- Requirements doc from initial brainstorm session
- pdf_test.html: Working proof-of-concept for PDF PN extraction using pdf.js
- .gitignore: Exclude temp files and IDE configs

Technology decision: HTML/JS single-file app \(not Python .exe\)
PDF extraction validated: Successfully extracts PNs from NetSuite PO PDFs
Material parsing tested: 87% auto-match rate against known materials list

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add MRR Automation tool v1

Core features implemented:
- File loading UI for PO PDF, Flat BOM Excel, MRR Template Excel
- PDF PN extraction using pdf.js
- Excel reading using SheetJS
- Cross-reference: matches PO PNs against Flat BOM
- Material parsing: splits at last comma, validates against known materials
- Review table with exclude checkboxes and editable material fields
- Color code lookup from MRR Template Data sheet
- Flags PNs found in PO but not in BOM
- Export to Excel with MRR format

Ready for user GUI validation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Reset button and show descriptions for not-found PNs

- Extract PN + description from PDF Part Number/Rev column
- Smart duplicate detection to separate Part Number/Rev from Description column
- Display descriptions for PNs not found in Flat BOM \(e.g., "1027730 - IMPACT TEST COUPON"\)
- Add Reset button to clear all loaded files and start fresh

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
